title: Once a day free dodge should be a thing
body:
You can't help it if you get a troll holding your game hostage in champ select... I almost just lost my promos because someone's champ got banned by my team and they decided they wanted to go smite top Soraka to troll. Luckily somone dodged, but this shit happens so often. I swear 30% of people who play ranked are mentally ill. Once a day dodge protection would be nice so we could at least avoid this crap.

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
